Downing Street's indication that Andy Coulson will not be receiving severance pay is in line with the standard contract for special advisers, it said. The contract, drawn up in June, reads: Because of the power of the Crown to dismiss at will, you are not entitled to a period of notice terminating your employment. However, unless your employment is terminated by agreement, results from... disciplinary proceedings, inefficiency or grounds justifying summary dismissal at common law, you will in practice normally be given not less than three months' notice in writing terminating your employment. On the expiration of such notice, your employment will terminate. 66% of ComRes respondents thought PM should not have hired Andy Coulson knowing he had resigned as NoW editor over phone-hacking scandal. also revealed that the American X Factor would be open to contestants as young as 12 years old. Unlike his hit American Idol, the competition is open to vocal groups as well as solo singers. I've never believed there should be a cut-off age for talent, and we are going to put our money where our mouths are with the$ 5 million recording contract, Simon Cowell said. Simon Cowell , creator of American Idol and a former judge on that show, will judge the US X Factor along with British singers George Michael and Cheryl Cole . Additional judges and the show's host

responsibility in the company. Earlier all the major strategic decisions were taken by the three of them together. But that is set to change. In a self-authored blogpost Eric Schmidt details about the new roles, Larry will now lead product development and technology strategy, his greatest strengths, and starting from April 4 he will take charge of our day-to-day operations as Google's Chief Executive Officer. In this new role I know he will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly. I am enormously proud of my last decade as CEO, and I am certain that the next 10 years under Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead. Eric Schmidt describes co-founder Sergey Brin as an "innovator and entrepreneur to the core" and rightly so, his role in new and strategic projects would be much needed. He would continue to sport the "co-founder" title
